description:
Belchero Orphanage is an orphanage in Orth run by http://anidb.net/ch90488 [Belchero]. It comes complete with a school, where the children there learn to be delvers. Red Whistles from the orphanage often go searching for artifacts in the first layer to sell overseas and help raise money for the orphanage.
Source: Made in Abyss Wiki
name: Belchero Kojiin
